Text: Forgot to add:  This is an ACTUAL AUDIOBOOK of Thucydides' work, NOT a lecture or a work by another author.
Which means it will be incredibly boring unless you yourself are an incredible bore.

"Historians universally agree that Thucydides was the greatest historian who has ever lived."

That is the most ignorant statement I have ever read! Historians don't universally agree on anything. Thucydides was an important early historian - perhaps the most important, but his non-academic approach would get him kicked out of any first year history degree program in the Western World. Even a plagiarist like Stephen Ambrose was a better historian!
Why the hell are you commenting here if you think audiobooks are an incredible bore?
